name: Samurai Jack: Rave Slaves
storyline: This 3-level game takes its storyline from the Samurai Jack episode "Jack and the Rave". Aku's nefarious DJ holds a group of teenage ravers under his spell! Avoid the dancers and destroy all the amplifiers to release the kids from the grip of Aku's evil beats. The ravers will attack you if disturbed, but remember, they are acting under Aku's influence and would rather be dancing. Be careful not to hurt too many of the kids, or you won't advance to the next level. You can thwart the dancers' attacks by dancing.
summary: Samurai Jack: Rave Slaves was a Macromedia Shockwave Toonami game that was available to play on cartoonnetwork.com beginning in 2003. However, the game did not appear on toonami.com until 2004. The game is no longer available at cartoonnetwork.com, but has been archived by fans.
